More examplesFewer examplesSome of the sections are already marked off with pencilled crosses. Madame raised a pencilled eyebrow but asked no questions. Mr. Green has again promised me the pencilled sketches of Dove's Nest. His immaculate pencilled log, charting the horrors of life in the trenches, has just come to light after 90 years.
